entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 8 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023
